password.description: This is the password to use to access the Red Hat Satellite server. This must be provided in the config or in the environment variable `SATELLITE_PASSWORD`.

satellite_host.description: This is the hostname or IP address of the Red Hat Satellite server. This must be provided in the config or in the environment variable `SATELLITE_HOST`.

ssl_verify.description: Should we validate the SSL certificate presented by the Satellite server?. Defaults to `true`.

username.description: This is the username to use to access the Red Hat Satellite server. This must be provided in the config or in the environment variable `SATELLITE_USERNAME`.

content_view_id.description: The ID of the content view to associate with the activation key.

description.description: A description of the activation key.

environment_id.description: The ID of the environment that contains the `content_view_id`.

host_collection_ids.description: A list of host collection IDs to associate with the activation key. Machines activated with the key will be added to these host collections.

max_hosts.description: The maximum number of hosts allowed to use the activation key. Should not be set if `unlimited_hosts` is set to `true`.

name.description: The name of the activation key.  This is the value of the key that clients use to activate.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization to associate with the activation key.

unlimited_hosts.description: Should an unlimited number of hosts be allowed to use the activation key? Defaults to `true`.

block.description: Resource to manage a Red Hat Satellite Activation Key.

auth_source_id.description: The ID of the authentication source that contains the external user group.

auth_source_ldap.description: A list of objects containing the authentication source the associated with the external user group.

name.description: The name of the external user group.

user_group_id.description: The ID of the user group that the external user group should be associated with.

block.description: Resource to manage an external user group in Red Hat Satellite.

created_at.description: A timestamp of when the filter was created.

location_ids.description: A list of IDs of locations to associate with the filter. Unless `override` is set to `true` this should generally contain the `location_ids` that the parent role is associated with. It may also need to be set to an empty list if you desire the permission to be `unlimited`.

locations.description: A list of objects containing the locations the filter applies to.

organization_ids.description: A list of IDs of organizations to associate with the filter. Unless `override` is set to `true` this should generally contain the `organization_ids` that the parent role is associated with. It may also need to be set to an empty list if you desire the permission to be `unlimited`.

organizations.description: A list of objects containing the organizations the filter applies to.

override.description: When set to true, you can specify `location_ids` and `organization_ids` to allow the role to access the `resource_type` in the specified locations and organizations.

permission_ids.description: A list of permission IDs that match the list of permissions supplied in `permission_names`.

permission_names.description: A list of permission names that should be enabled in the filter. The permission names must be valid for the role specified in `resource_type`.

permissions.description: A list of objects containing the permissions enabled in the filter.

resource_type.description: The resource type of the filter.  Once this is set, it cannot be changed without recreating the filter.

role.description: An object containing information about the role the filter is associated with.

role_id.description: The ID of the role that the filter should be created under.

search.description: If this is not set, then the filter will apply to all objects of the specified resource type. This means the value of `unlimited` will be true.  You can specify a search which can be used to limit the resources that the permission applies to. This will result in the value of `unlimited` being false. For more information see the [Red Hat documentation](https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_satellite/6.8/html/administering_red_hat_satellite/chap-Red_Hat_Satellite-Administering_Red_Hat_Satellite-Users_and_Roles#sect-Red_Hat_Satellite-Administering_Red_Hat_Satellite-Users_and_Roles-Granular_Permission_Filtering).

unlimited.description: A boolean that indicates if a filter applies to all resources of the `resource_type` or just a subset of resources specified in `search`.

updated_at.description: A timestamp of when the filter was last updated.

block.description: Resource to manage a permission filter for a role in Red Hat Satellite.

created_at.description: A timestamp containing when the host collection was created.

description.description: A description of the host collection.

max_hosts.description: The maximum number of hosts allowed to be in the host collection. Should not be set if `unlimited_hosts` is set to `true`.

name.description: The name of the host collection.

organization_id.description: The ID of organization that the host collection should be created in. Once set, it cannot be changed without recreating the resource.

unlimited_hosts.description: A boolean that controls if an unlimited number of members are allowed in the host collection. Defaults to `true`.

updated_at.description: A timestamp containing when the host collection was last changed.

block.description: Resource to manage a Red Hat Satellite Host Collection.

parent_id.description: The ID of a parent for this location. This allows you to nest locations. If not set, a top level location is created.

block.description: Resource to manage a Red Hat Satellite location.

hosts_count.description: A count of how many hosts are registered to the organization.

label.description: The label of the organization. If not set, Satellite will use the `name` as the label.  This field can only be set at creation time. If not being set explicitly you will probably want to use `ignore_changes` on this in the lifecycle block.

block.description: Resource to manage a Red Hat Satellite organization.

builtin.description: A boolean that indicates if the role is a default/builtin role.

cloned_from_id.description: If this role was cloned using the API, the ID number of the source role.

filters.description: A list of filter IDs associated with the role.

location_ids.description: A list of IDs of locations to associate with the role.

locations.description: A list of objects containing the locations the role applies to.

organization_ids.description: A list of IDs of organizations to associate with the role.

organizations.description: A list of objects containing the organizations the role applies to.

block.description: Resource to manage a role in Red Hat Satellite.

history.description: A list of objects containing information on operations peformed on the manifest.

manifest.description: A Base64 encoded string of a manifest zip file downloaded from Red Hat Subscription Management. Most easily used in conjunction with [`rhsm_allocation_manifest` resource from the RHSM provider](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/umich-vci/rhsm/latest/docs/resources/allocation_manifest).

organization_id.description: The organization ID you want to attach the manifest to.

block.description: Resource to manage a subscription manifest attached to a Red Hat Satellite organization.

admin.description: If set to true, then the group will grant administrator privileges.

created_at.description: A timestamp containing when the user group was created.

name.description: A name for the user group.

role_ids.description: A list of IDs of roles to associate with the group.

roles.description: A list of objects containing the roles the associated with the user group.

updated_at.description: A timestamp containing when the user group was last changed.

block.description: Resource to manage a user group in Red Hat Satellite.

account.description: The DN of the LDAP Bind Account.

attr_firstname.description: The LDAP attribute that maps to first name.

attr_lastname.description: The LDAP attribute that maps to last name.

attr_login.description: The LDAP attribute that maps to username.

attr_mail.description: The LDAP attribute that maps to email address.

attr_photo.description: The LDAP attribute that maps to a photo.

base_dn.description: The base DN from which LDAP searches will be performed.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the LDAP authentication source was created.

groups_base.description: The base DN from which LDAP searches for groups will be performed.

host.description: The hostname of the LDAP server.

name.description: The name of the LDAP authentication source.

port.description: The port the LDAP server is listening on.

search.description: A search filter for the LDAP Authentication Source search. The search must only return 1 authentication source.

server_type.description: The type of the LDAP server.

tls.description: Is TLS enabled for the LDAP server?

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the LDAP authentication source was last updated.

block.description: Data source to access information about a Red Hat Satellite LDAP Authentication Source.

activation_keys.description: A list of Activation Keys that reference the Content View.

auto_publish.description: Is auto publish enabled for the Content View?

component_ids.description: A list of component IDs contained in the Content View.

composite.description: Is the Content View a composite view?

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the Content View was created.

default.description: Is the Content View a default view?

description.description: A description of the Content View.

environment_id.description: The ID of a Lifecycle Environment to look for the Content View in.

environments.description: A list of Lifecycle Environments containing the Content View.

label.description: A label for the Content View.

last_published.description: Timestamp of when the Content View was last published.

latest_version.description: The latest version of the Content View.

name.description: The name of the Content View.

next_version.description: The next proceeding version of the Content View.

noncomposite.description: Is the Content View not a composite view?

nondefault.description: Is the Content View a non-default view?

organization.description: The organization that contains the Content View.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization that contains the Content View.

repositories.description: A list of repositories contained in the Content View.

repository_ids.description: A list of repository IDs contained in the Content View.

search.description: A search filter for the Content View search. The search must only return 1 Content View.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the Content View was last updated.

version_count.description: The number of versions of the Content View.

versions.description: A list of the versions of the Content View.

block.description: Data source to access information about a Red Hat Satellite Content View.

counts.description: A map of various counts of attributes of the Lifecycle Environment.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the Lifecycle Environment was created.

description.description: A description of the Lifecycle Environment.

label.description: A label for the Lifecycle Environment.

library.description: Is the Lifecycle Environment a base Library?

name.description: The name of the Lifecycle Environment.

organization.description: The organization that contains the Lifecycle Environment.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization that contains the Lifecycle Environment.

permissions.description: The current Satellite user's permissions for the Lifecycle Environment.

prior.description: The Lifecycle Environment directly before this one.

search.description: A search filter for the Lifecycle Environment search. The search must only return 1 Lifecycle Environment.

successor.description: The Lifecycle Environment directly after this one.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the Lifecycle Environment was last updated.

block.description: Data source to access information about a Red Hat Satellite Lifecycle Environment.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the location was created.

parent_id.description: The ID of the parent for this location.  If not set, the location is a top level location.

parent_name.description: The name of the parent for this location.  If not set, the location is a top level location.

search.description: A search filter for the Location search. The search must only return 1 Location.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the location was last updated.

block.description: Data source to access information about a Red Hat Satellite location.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the organization was created.

search.description: A search filter for the Location search. The search must only return 1 Organization.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the organization was last updated.

block.description: Data source to access information about a Red Hat Satellite organization.

search.description: A search filter for the permission search. If not specified all permissions are returned.

block.description: Data source to access information about available Red Hat Satellite permissions.

organization_id.description: An Organization ID to filter the product search on.

product_name.description: A product name to filter the product search on.

products.description: A list of objects containing information on the products.

red_hat_only.description: A boolean that controls if the search should only return Red Hat products.

block.description: Data source to access information about available Red Hat Satellite products.
